translation.Existiu um problema ao gravar as alteraç: There was a problem saving the alterations!
translation.Tem a certeza que deseja remover o grupo: Are you sure you want to delete this user group
translation.Não foi possível remover o Grupo de util: There was a problem removing the User Group!
translation.Ohh! Não foi possível encontrar grupos d: Ohh! It wasn't possible to find User Groups!
translation.ano_letivo.Tem a certeza que deseja remo: Are you sure that you want ot delete the academic year
translation.ano_letivo.O novo ano letivo foi aberto: The academic year was created with success!
translation.ano_letivo.Ocorreu um problema ao abrir: There was a problem creating the academic year!
translation.ano_letivo.Ao abrir um novo ano letivo,: Creating a new academic year, it will be the one by default to the users!
translation.ano_letivo.Tem a certeza que deseja abri: Are you sure you want to create a new academic year with the following code?
translation.ano_letivo.Ano letivo removido com suces: The academic year was removed with success!
translation.ano_letivo.Ocorreu um problema ao remove: There was a problem removing the academic year!
translation.ano_letivo.Ocorreu um problema ao atuali: There was a problem updating the academic year!
translation.É o ano que irá estar selecionado automá: It is the year that will be automatically selected for the user! Only one can be selected at a time.
translation.Anos letivos disponivies para os utiliza: Academic years available for users to select.
translation.ano_letivo.Irá começar brevemente a sinc: It will start shortly the synchronization for the academic year
translation.ano_letivo.Ocorreu um problema ao tentar: There was a problem trying to start the synchronization for the academic year
translation.ano_letivo.A sincronização vai sempre ac: The synchronization will always happen when we click the button?
translation.ano_letivo.Não. Irá ser iniciada a sincr: No. The synchronization will be initialized when the server has no work to do.
translation.ano_letivo.Todos os semestres e ano leti: And all the semesters and academic years that are active and have already been synchronized once, will be synchronized again every day at 3am.
translation.ano_letivo.Ja existem em sincronizacao,: There is already a synchronization occurring, you need to wait until its finished before start a new one.
translation.ano_letivo.Apenas 1 sincronização pode a: Only 1 synchronization can occur at a time, to prevent duplicated records or to block the server.

translation.Ocorreu um erro ao carregar a informacao: Something went wrong while trying to fetch data
translation.Apenas o formato CSV é aceite pelo impor: Only the CSV format is accepted by the importer, so you should follow the rules for building a CSV.
translation.O caracter utilizado para separação de c: The character used for column separation is:
translation.Os índices (index) começam no número 0,: The indices (index) start at the number 0, so be aware of this fact and 'convert' to the correct index.
translation.O nome da unidade curricular é a segunda: The name of the curricular unit is the second (2nd) column, so we must convert to index = 1, as we always remove 1 unit from the order number of the column.
translation.Sugere-se que as variáveis que recebem o: It is suggested that the variables that receive data related to the academic year and semester are according to the following list:
translation.anoletivo -> Pronto a receber no formato: academic year -> Ready to receive in format: 202122
translation.periodo -> Pronto a receber no formato (: semester -> Ready to receive in format (S1/S2)
